item.title: 50 Well walk, 28th July
item.description:
Bikes left outside designated parking zone ! In middle of street across a drive. This is a continual issue getting worse every week. It is dangerous and causing a hazard to pedestrians, cars, and makes it impossible to drive into or out of the driveway. This bike zone needs to be moved as is no longer being monitored sufficientlty and is a hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Well Walk, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fine wood chippings left behind by contractor who removed tree stump of diseased tree, 28th July
item.description:
The fine wood chippings where the tree stump was removed has become a glorified dog toilet. The chippings are also being blown across the pavement. It would've have been best to fill it with soil or pebbles rather than these very fine wood chippings left by the contractors.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 119, Venner Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on fences of 1 and 2 thaxted, 28th July
item.description:
Graffiti on fences of 1 and 2 thaxted road, Sidcup road side. Councillor Cathy got it sorted a year ago and it remained graffiti free but now it's back. Please remove as it looks unsightly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Thaxted Road, New Eltham, London
